message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $600,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Alice, that's a great starting point, but I'm really hoping to get this product for a bit less.  I'm willing to offer you $500,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I think the product is worth a bit more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $550,000. What do you think?
